title: Hero Content Update
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN content in the hero gets updated to a game
OR content in the hero gets updated to an SLIVE
OR content in the hero gets updated to an FLIVE
OR content in the hero gets updated to a VOD/SVOD
custom_expected:
THEN the content is updated successfully
AND no error messages are displayed
AND focus is not lost from the page

title: Favorite team game is pre-game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a game with the user's favorite team is present in the hero
AND the game is in a pre-game/scheduled state
AND the mediaState=MEDIA_OFF
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND a blue pill displays left justified above the away team logo
AND the scheduled game time displays in the user's local timezone
AND a "Watch Now" button does NOT display
AND a "LIVE" indicator pill does NOT display

title: Favorite team game is pre-game - blacked out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND the user's favorite team game is displaying in the Hero
AND the user's location is in the viewing market of the game
AND the game is not a partner game (AppleTV+, Peacock, etc.)
AND the game is pre-game/scheduled
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero 
AND the away team logo and away team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND a blue pill displays left justified above the away team logo
AND the scheduled game time displays in the user's local timezone
AND a "BLACKOUT" pill is displayed left justified above the away team
AND the "Watch Now" button does not display if the user is blacked out

title: Favorite team game is live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a game with the user's favorite team is present in the hero
AND the game is in a preview/live state
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND a red pill with white "LIVE" text displays above the away team logo
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the "Watch Live" button is white with black text
AND the "Watch Live" button has focus when the Home page loads
AND game playback at the live point is successful after the user selects the "Watch Live" button
AND the user's favorite team feed begins playback

THEN a white circle icon with the AppleTV+ logo displays to the right of the blue game time pill above the away team

AND the text "Watch on AppleTV+" displays to the right of the AppleTV+ logo above the away team
AND AppleTV+ messaging is displayed in the feed select modal after selecting the "Watch Now"/"Watch Live" button
AND the user is unable to playback the video feed

title: Watch Now button displays when MEDIA_ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a live game is present in the hero
AND the live game has broadcasters assigned
AND the video feeds mediaState = MEDIA_ON
custom_steps: WHEN the live game displays in the hero
custom_expected:
THEN the "Watch Live" button displays
AND playback successfully starts at the live point after the user selects the "Watch Live" button

title: Watch Now button does not display when MEDIA_OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback

AND the scheduled game has broadcasters assigned
AND the video feeds mediaState = MEDIA_OFF

custom_expected:
THEN the "Watch Live" button does not display
AND the user is unable to start playback

AND the feed level espnAuthRequired = true

title: -Stream Live Featured Game From Home Page - Hero
custom_preconds: Requires Featured Live game with favorite team playing
custom_steps:
1. Launch the app
2. Navigate to the Home page
3. Press Watch Now (Live featured game)
4. Use the d-pad to navigate to and select one of the video feeds
custom_expected:
1. 
2. Home page for today displays over the static background image
3. Feed selection modal is displayed and displays:
* Away team logo on the left
* Home team logo on the right
* Star icon to the left of your favorite team's logo (if your favorite team is playing)
* If there is a score: current score displayed between the team logos with the current state of the game (inning, bases, balls, strikes, outs) displayed below
* If there is no score: '@' is displayed with the word 'Live' below
* Below the fold:
* Home team's video feed, preceded by a screen icon
* Away team's video feed, preceded by a screen icon
* Away Audio column, with all available away audio options listed (each audio option is preceded by an equalizer icon)
* Home Audio column, with all available home audio options listed (each audio option is preceded by an equalizer icon)
* Focus defaults to the first feed option

4. Live featured game is streamed:
* Modal and Home page are dismissed
* Loading screen is displayed while video player is initializing/loading
* Video player streams selected game

Designs: https://zpl.io/2pj9MDj
